title: Atlanta reality star reports jewelry stolen from Lamborghini
text:
ATLANTA (AP) - A reality television star and the wife of rapper T.I. says $750,000 dollars’ worth of jewelry, including wedding rings, was stolen from her Lamborghini outside of an Atlanta bar.

News outlets report Tameka “Tiny” Harris told Atlanta police that the rings, as well as watches and stud earrings, were among the pricey pieces missing when she returned to her car after a Sunday night event. She told officers she left a blue velour bag on her center console with the jewelry inside and later discovered it was gone.

A friend who was with Harris told police she returned to the car once that evening, but didn’t know of the jewelry inside.

Officials told WSB-TV that security stationed near the bar didn’t see anything suspicious.

The theft is being investigated.
